thread.title: IOB Q1 net plunges 95% to Rs 15 crore
thread.title_full: IOB Q1 net plunges 95% to Rs 15 crore | Business Standard News

author: BS Reporter
title: IOB Q1 net plunges 95% to Rs 15 crore
text:
Indian Overseas Bank recorded a 95% drop in net profit during the quarter ended June 30, 2015 at Rs 14.76 crore from net profit of Rs 271.7 crore in the year-ago period.  
Total income increased to Rs 6,672.1 crore for the quarter ended June 30, 2015 from Rs 6,284.6 crore for same period last fiscal.  
Gross NPA as on June 30, 2015 stood at Rs 16,451.20 crore, which is 9.40% of gross advances, as against Rs 10,350.83 crore (5.84%) during the same period last year.  
The Gross NPA for the quarter ended March 31, 2015 was Rs 14,922.45 crore (8.33%). 
Net NPA as on June 30, 2015 stood at Rs 10,640.43 crore (6.31%) as against Rs 6,643.62 crore (3.85%) for the same quarter last fiscal.  
The net NPA during the quarter ended March 31, 2015 was at Rs 9,813.33 crore (5.68%). 
Provision Coverage Ratio (PCR) stood at 50.79% as on June 30, 2015. 
Net interest margin (NIM) stood at 1.92% during the first quarter as against 1.87% a year ago.
